walkthrough.notebooks.welcome.title: Explore the Positron Notebook in Alpha
walkthrough.notebooks.welcome.descriptio: Learn how to work with Jupyter notebooks in Positron for data science workflows!
walkthrough.notebooks.panesAndUI.title: Get to know the Positron UI
walkthrough.notebooks.panesAndUI.descrip:
Explore the panes and layout options designed for interactive data science when working with notebooks
[View Notebook Layout](command:workbench.action.positronNotebookLayout)
walkthrough.notebooks.interpreter.title: Select a Python interpreter
walkthrough.notebooks.interpreter.descri:
Choose the Python environment for your notebook
[Select an interpreter](command:workbench.action.language.runtime.selectSession)
walkthrough.notebooks.aiAssistant.title: Context-Aware AI for Notebooks
walkthrough.notebooks.aiAssistant.descri:
Get help with an assistant that understands your data and execution history, not just your code
[Open the Assistant](command:workbench.action.chat.open)
walkthrough.notebooks.optIn.title: Try the Positron Notebook
walkthrough.notebooks.optIn.description:
Enable the new Positron Notebook editor
[Open Settings](command:positronNotebookHelpers.walkthrough.enableNotebook)
